column1: #text=Flying in an airplane is always exciting .
#text=The day before , I always make sure that my bags are packed .
#text=If you are bringing a carry on , pack that as well but make sure you follow guidelines for liquids .
#text=Also make sure your bags do not weigh too much to avoid extra charges .
#text=The morning of your flight , make sure you get there one or two hours early , depending on the size of the airport .
#text=Check your bags in necessary and recieve your boarding ticket .
#text=After that , you can head over to security .
#text=At Security , take off your shoes and any metal and put them in a bin along with your phone and carry on .
#text=When the guard tells you to do so , walk through the scanner .
#text=Once cleared , you can grab your things back .
#text=Now wait until your flight is called to board .
#text=When it is time , hand oyur boarding pass the the flight attendant and take you seat .
#text=Stow your carry on and buckle your seatbelt .
#text=Watch the flight attendant give the safty demonstration , and enjoy your flight !
